title: WTT Matty Dark Cap PB for Matty Portrait
author: Carter08

posts.post_title: WTT Matty Dark Cap PB for Matty Portrait
posts.post_content: My Matty is a nice psa 2 polar bear. Would like to partially trade for a Matty portrait in the 2 range. PM me if interested and we can exchange pics and price thoughts. Thanks, Jim
